title: Focus Group Study/Survey Report
snippet:
This project involves developing a focus group report from the data collected in surveys.
It would take this information:
Access data online:
https://www.surveymonkey.net/results/SM-WSF9TP6X/

And produce a report that is 8-10 pages with relevant context, content, trends, outcomes, summary, etc.

The report would be complete by Nov.  6 or 7.

Sample attached and link:
http://www.cihc.ca/files/publications/CIHC_IPE_FocusGroupsReport_May2009.pdf
Background will be provided upon start of contract.

Please provide samples of your work.
